channel.title: Tops on Musings of a Catalan Londoner in Prague
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Musings of a Catalan Londoner in Prague

item.description: Hi! I’m Bernat and I am a software developer born in Barcelona who moved to London in 2012 when my life was in desperate need of a radical change. For a variety of reasons, me and my family decided that April 2020 was the right time to relocate again, this time to the Czech Republic. This is a small space where I will write about what it’s like for a Catalan born in Barcelona to start a new life in Prague.
